settings.heading: Our Black Friday Bundles Have Landed!

settings.text: At Natureâ€™s Craft, we understand that life can get busy, which is why we have put together bundles that are affordable, effective, and made with only the best that nature has to offer. Our bundles have been carefully curated to address a variety of health concerns and are the perfect way to end the year on a high note.

settings.heading: Immunity Bundle
settings.text: Tired of stuffy noses and constantly feeling under the weather? Fear no more with our immunity bundle by your side!

settings.heading: Fertility Bundle
settings.text: This bundle has everything that you need for conception and performance support. Packed with only the best vitamins to help promote fertility for women and enhanced drive, motility, and volume in men.

settings.heading: Kids GummiesPack
settings.text: Everyone loves a tasty gummy and our limited edition bundle includes 4 delicious and nutritious gummies with all the vitamins needed for a healthy and carefree childhood.

settings.heading: Heart HealthPack
settings.text: A holistic blend of botanicals for keeping your blood pumping and feeling your best every day.

settings.heading: Brain Health
settings.text: Staying on top of your game is harder than ever before with all the distractions of modern-day life. Brain fog, struggling to stay focused throughout the day is something that everyone experiences. Our capsules for brain health will give you the edge that you need and give you the confidence to face each day knowing you are performing at your best.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.faq_answer: Yes, we offer Free shipping for all US orders over $30.

settings.title: How can I update my shipping information?
settings.faq_answer: Your shipping address and information can be updated in the Account Details in your account.

settings.title: How can I modify or cancel my order?
settings.faq_answer: Please reach out to us at support@shopnaturescraft.com

settings.title: How long will it take my order to arrive?
settings.faq_answer: You should receive your order in 3-5 business days once it has shipped. However, due to the effects of the pandemic on global logistics, there may be delays with transit times.
